app.name: disc2app
app.long_description:
Dump disc content (.app/-h3/.tmd/.cert/.tik files) from a Wii U game disc.
Make sure that a FAT32 SD card/USB device is inserted that has at least 23.3Gb free.
The files will be dumped to /install/(DISC-NAME)/ folder, which can be installed by wupinstaller.
Based on wudump and wud2app by FIX94.
